courses.title: React Basics
courses.description: A comprehensive introduction to React, including components, state, and props.

courses.title: Advanced React
courses.description: Dive deep into React hooks, context API, and performance optimization techniques.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Principles
courses.description: Learn how to design user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript, including ES6+ features.

courses.title: TypeScript in Depth
courses.description: A guide to using TypeScript for building scalable and maintainable applications.

courses.title: Full Stack Development
courses.description: Learn to build end-to-end applications using MERN stack. Includes MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Create stunning websites that look great on all devices. Create Desktop, Tablet and Mobile responsive websites.

courses.title: Python for Data Analysis
courses.description: Analyze data efficiently using Python libraries such as Pandas and NumPy.

courses.title: Machine Learning Basics
courses.description: Understand the basics of machine learning and build your first models.
